code: @Test public void startServiceTwice() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = new DefaultCamelContext().     final String fromStr = "cxf:http://localhost:" + PORT + "/" + this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "/test?serviceClass=org.apache.camel.component.cxf.HelloService".     // add the same route twice...     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from(fromStr).to("log:POJO").         }     }).     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from(fromStr).to("log:POJO").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Expect to catch an exception here").     } catch (Exception ex) {         assertTrue(ex.getMessage().endsWith("Multiple consumers for the same endpoint is not allowed: cxf://http://localhost:" + PORT + "/" + getClass().getSimpleName() + "/test?serviceClass=org.apache.camel.component.cxf.HelloService")).     }     context.stop(). }
